text: Approval for the mammomat inspiration with tomosynthesis option. this device is indicated for the acquisition of 2d as well as 3d digital mammography images to be used in screening and diagnosis of breast cancer. each screening examination may consist of cc and mlo views in: a 2d image set, or a 2d and 3d image set. note: the screening examination may consist of 2d ffdm images set with or without the 3d  image set.
